entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 12:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -28.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -33.8°C
Wind: WNW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21.
